title: General Liability Group
introduction: Swartz Campbell LLC is a regional insurance defense firm providing comprehensive legal services and counseling to insurers and self-insureds in complex civil matters. With a legacy spanning over a century, the firm has built a reputation based on its unwavering commitment to clients, demonstrated through aggressive advocacy and expert legal guidance across a wide spectrum of litigation areas.

We are currently seeking talented, motivated legal professionals to join our team in our Philadelphia and Pittsburgh offices. We have immediate openings for a full-time litigation Associate in the Professional Liability Group and a full-time litigation Associate in the General Liability Group. We offer meaningful hands-on experience, a collaborative team environment, and opportunities for professional growth.
description: The General Liability Group is also seeking an experienced attorney to join our practice. The group represents businesses, property owners, motor vehicle operators/owners and insurance carriers in defending against claims of bodily injury, property damage, and economic loss arising from alleged negligence and other tort claims in New Jersey and Southeastern Pennsylvania.
idealCandidate: The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years experience defending clients in a variety of general liability matters. However, we are also open to training a recent bar recipient with some internship/clerkship experience in a relevant field.
